Uses of Interface
org.funcito.functorbase.FunctorBase

  • Packages that use FunctorBase 
    Package Description
    org.funcito.functorbase  
    org.funcito.functorfactory  
    org.funcito.mode
    Mode and TypedMode interfaces and core implementations.

    • Uses of FunctorBase in org.funcito.functorbase

      Classes in org.funcito.functorbase that implement FunctorBase 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractFunctorBase<T,V>
      An abstract partial implementation of the FunctorBase interface, with internal state useful for optimizing executing a single non-chained method call.
      class  BasicFunctor<T,V>
      A basic implementation of the FunctorBase interface, with optimizations for an InvokableState of a single non-chained method call.
      class  NullValidatingPredicate
      This functor is intended for use by predicate-classes from 3rd party APIs, which have a primitive boolean return type.
      class  SafeNavFunctor<T,V>
      This functor is roughly modelled after the Groovy language safe-navigation operator: ?. The main difference is that once-applied to the head of a method call-chain, it implicitly applies to all remaining chained elements in the expression as well.
      class  TailDefaultFunctor<T,V>
      This functor modifies basic execution of the InvokableState, by checking the final computed return value to see if it is null and providing an alternate default value instead.

    • Uses of FunctorBase in org.funcito.functorfactory

      Methods in org.funcito.functorfactory that return FunctorBase 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T,V> FunctorBase<T,V> FunctorFactory.makeFunctionalBase(InvokableState state, Mode mode)
      Factory method for functors which use an untyped Mode
      <T,V> FunctorBase<T,V> FunctorFactory.makeFunctionalBase(InvokableState state, TypedMode<V> mode)
      Factory method for functors which use a TypedMode

      Methods in org.funcito.mode that return FunctorBase 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FunctorBase<?,?> Mode.makeBase(InvokableState invokableState)
      Converts a captured invokable state into a FunctorBase that guides the execution of a wrapping 3rd party API function-like object.

      FunctorBase<?,?> SafeNav.makeBase(InvokableState invokableState)

      Converts a captured invokable state into a FunctorBase that guides the execution of a wrapping 3rd party API function-like object.
      FunctorBase<?,V> TypedSafeNav.makeBase(InvokableState invokableState) 
      FunctorBase<?,Boolean> ValidateNullBoolean.makeBase(InvokableState invokableState)
